---
title: "screencast"
output:
  html_document:
    toc: false
---

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(htmltools)
tag <- tags$iframe(
  src = "https://www.youtube.com/embed/qOkz_T-6mEI",
  width = "960", height = "540",
  style = "max-width:100%;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-radius:8px;",
  allow = "accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share",
  allowfullscreen = 1
)
HTML(as.character(tag))
```
